attributes.action: Remove all restrictions related to covid 19 and reinstate our human rights
attributes.additional_details: Remove mandatory face mask rule. Remove the 10pm curfew on hospitality. Remove the number limit on gatherings. Reinstate freedom of expression, including the right to seek, receive and impart information of all kinds, regardless of frontiers. Reinstate the right to quality healthcare for all non covid related health concerns. Stop reporting deaths for any reason within 28 days of a positive test, and only report deaths directly from covid. Remove track and trace. Repeal the coronavirus act 2020
attributes.background: The restrictions infringe on our human rights and are disproportionate to the level of threat. Now that we are further down the line, it’s very clear that this virus is no longer a major public health threat. Let the British public take charge of their own health and well-being.
